column2: We have established the Royal Navy.
We have done the measures to bring our fleet to old glory.

Our enemies are trying to threaten our homeland with their naval buildup and are clearly prepearing to invade us. We will not standing idly by, we will expand our fleet with an ambitious naval program. Britons never will be slaves!

From the middle decades of the 17th century, and through the 18th century, the Royal Navy vied with the Dutch Navy and later with the French Navy for maritime supremacy. From the mid 18th century, it was the world's most powerful navy until the Second World War. The Royal Navy played a key part in establishing and defending the British Empire. Brittania rules the Waves!
